text: Why Not is the debut studio album from Taiwanese Mandopop artist Ella Chen of girl group S.H.E. It was released on 17 April 2015 by HIM International Music. The tracks "Love Addiction" (信愛成癮) and "Wasted Tears" (浪費眼淚) are listed at number 36 and 73 respectively on Hit FM's Annual Top 100 Singles Chart for 2015.Hit FM Annual Top 100 Singles Chart 2015Hit FM Annual Top 100 Singles Chart 2015 ==Track listing== == Concerts == {| class="wikitable" style="width:800px;" |- !align="left"|Concert Name !align="left"|Date !align="left"|Location !align="left"|Special guests |- |align="left"|Are You Normal Concert (你正常嗎?唱演會) |align="left"|June 7, 2015 |align="left"|Taipei, Taiwan Leagacy Taipei |align="left"|Selina, Hebe |- |align="left"|Are You Normal Concert (你正常嗎?唱演會) |align="left"|August 9, 2015 |align="left"|Beijing, China Wukesong Arena-Space M |align="left"| |- |align="left"|Are You Normal Concert (你正常嗎?唱演會) |align="left"|December 25, 2015 |align="left"|Guangzhou, China RockHouse |align="left"| |- |} ==Music Videos== {| class="wikitable" ! width="280px"|Title !! width="180px"|Director !! width="130px"|Release date !!
